root.text: Do crazy thing which is hard to imagine! Create your own visual style let it beunique for yourself and yet identifiable for others. Creativity is making your ownversion. With a good photo and creativity, you can easily turn your pictures into wonder. Do a little dig up and find the right one. Grow your skills!! Find your creativity!! And, set yourself up for success!!!.

text: Send your .jpeg file along with original .psd or .ai file to this email aartistrypsgkriya@gmail.com
Event starts on 12/02/2020, last date for sending .jpeg file is 18/02/2020, after that we wonâ€™t accept it.
Pictures will be posted on our Instagram page on 18/02/2020 and likes till 20/02/2020will be taken for evaluation.
The participants will be given a topic, they have to photoshop based on the topic given to them.
Editing tool such as Photoshop, Illustrator should be used.
Upload the .psd file or .ai file and image (.jpg) to our mail.
Shortlisted images will be uploaded on our Instagram page or Facebook page.
The image with maximum likes in social media and based on few evaluations done in .psd file will be declared as the Winner.
If photo is found to be plagiarised, it will be disqualified.
